VcBlade.description: Blade container component that implements the blade pattern for UI organization. Blades are panels that slide in from the right side of the screen.

templates.description: Simple list blade with basic table, toolbar, and navigation
List blade with custom filters slot (radio buttons, date range)
List blade with multiselect, bulk operations, and item actions
Simple details blade with form fields and basic validation
Advanced details blade with async validation, selects, and gallery

props.title: string - Title displayed in the blade header
props.subtitle: string - Subtitle displayed in the blade header
props.icon: string - Icon displayed in the blade header
props.width: number | string - Width of the blade (default: 30%)
props.expanded: boolean - Whether the blade is expanded to full width
props.closable: boolean - Whether the blade can be closed by the user
props.toolbarItems: IBladeToolbar[] - Array of toolbar items to display

VcTable.description: Highly customizable data table component with sorting, pagination, filtering, and multi-select support

props.items: T[] - Array of data items to display
props.stateKey: string - Unique key for persisting table state
props.empty: { icon?: string, text: string | ComputedRef<string>, action?: string, clickHandler?: () => void } - Empty state configuration
props.notfound: { icon?: string, text: string | ComputedRef<string>, action?: string, clickHandler?: () => void } - Not found state configuration

events.item-click: (item: T) => void - Emitted when row is clicked
events.header-click: (column: ITableColumns) => void - Emitted when column header is clicked
events.pagination-click: (page: number) => void - Emitted when pagination is clicked
events.search:change: (value: string) => void - Emitted when search value changes
events.selection-changed: (items: T[]) => void - Emitted when selection changes

slots.mobile-item: Custom mobile view for each item

examples.title: Table with Empty and Not Found States

compositions.description: Basic table with sorting and pagination
Table with multiselect and bulk actions

VcField.description: IMPORTANT: VcField is for DISPLAYING read-only data with label-value pairs. It is NOT a wrapper for form inputs! For forms, use Field from vee-validate.

props.label: string - Field label text
props.modelValue: string | number - Field value (for read-only display)
props.aspectRatio: [number, number] - Label to value width ratio for horizontal layout
props.copyable: boolean - Show copy button for read-only fields

VcInput.description: Text input field component with validation support, including date inputs and debounced search

props.type: string - Input type (text, email, url, number, date, password)
props.label: string - Input label

events.update:modelValue: (value: string | number) => void - Emitted when value changes

examples.title: Text Input with Validation (vee-validate)
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  :label="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.sku"
  rules="required|min:3"
  name="sku"
>
  <VcInput
    v-model="offer.sku"
    :label="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.TITLE')"
    :placeholder="$t('OFFER_DETAILS.FIELDS.SKU.PLACEHOLDER')"
    required
    maxlength="61"
    :loading="isSkuValidating"
    clearable
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  ></VcInput>
</Field>

events.update:modelValue: (value: string) => void - Emitted when value changes

VcSelect.description: Dropdown select component with search support, async options loading, and custom templates

props.options: Array | Function - Select options array or async function that returns options
props.optionValue: string - Property name to use as option value
props.optionLabel: string - Property name to use as option label
props.label: string - Select label

slots.selected-item: Custom template for selected item display

events.update:modelValue: (value: any) => void - Emitted when value changes

examples.title: Searchable Select with Async Options
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.productId"
  name="product"
  rules="required"
>
  <VcSelect
    v-model="offer.productId"
    :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.TITLE')"
    required
    searchable
    :loading="fetchProductsLoading"
    :placeholder="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT.PLACEHOLDER')"
    :options="fetchProducts"
    option-value="id"
    option-label="name"
    :disabled="!!offer.id"
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    :clearable="false"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  >
    <template #selected-item="{ opt }">
      <OfferProductsSelectCategoryTemplate
        :opt="opt"
        slot-name="selected-item"
      />
    </template>
    <template #option="{ opt }">
      <OfferProductsSelectCategoryTemplate
        :opt="opt"
        slot-name="option"
      />
    </template>
  </VcSelect>
</Field>

examples.title: Simple Select with Static Options
examples.code:
<Field
  v-slot="{ errorMessage, handleChange, errors }"
  rules="required"
  :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TITLE')"
  :model-value="offer.productType"
  name="productType"
>
  <VcSelect
    v-model="offer.productType"
    :label="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TITLE')"
    required
    :placeholder="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.PLACEHOLDER')"
    :disabled="!!offer.id"
    :error="!!errors.length"
    :error-message="errorMessage"
    :options="productTypeOptions"
    :tooltip="$t('OFFERS.PAGES.DETAILS.FIELDS.PRODUCT_TYPE.TOOLTIP')"
    option-value="value"
    option-label="label"
    @update:model-value="handleChange"
  ></VcSelect>
</Field>

events.update:modelValue: (value: boolean) => void - Emitted when checked state changes
(value: boolean) => void - Emitted when state changes

VcCard.description: Card container for grouping related form fields and content into visually distinct sections. IMPORTANT: Default slot has NO padding - always add tw-p-4 for forms or tw-p-2 for galleries.

props.icon: string - Material icon name displayed in header
props.fill: boolean - Card content fills available space

slots.default: Main card content (NO padding by default - add tw-p-4)

events.header:click: () => void - Emitted when header is clicked
events.state:collapsed: (collapsed: boolean) => void - Emitted when collapse state changes

examples.title: Basic Card with Form Fields

useCases: Grouping related form fields in details blades
notes: CRITICAL: Default slot has NO padding - always add tw-p-4 for forms, tw-p-2 for galleries
Use icon prop for visual identification of card purpose
Use is-collapsable for large forms to reduce visual clutter
Persist collapse state to localStorage for better UX
Add tw-space-y-4 to card content div for field spacing

VcWidget.description: Base widget component for details blades. Displays clickable cards with icon, title, and badge value. Used as foundation for all custom widgets.

props.title: string - Widget title text
props.value: string | number - Badge value (count, status, etc.)

events.click: () => void - Emitted when widget is clicked (if not disabled)

useCases: Custom action widgets in details blades
notes: Always use as base for custom widgets
See widgets-pattern.md for complete registration examples

VcBreadcrumbs.description: Adaptive navigation breadcrumbs with overflow handling and click handlers

props.items: Breadcrumbs[] - Array of breadcrumb items with { id, title, icon, clickHandler }

slots.trigger: { click: () => void, isActive: boolean } - Custom dropdown trigger

<VcBreadcrumbs :items="[

]" />

]" />
